segments.text: What kind of lease is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I have a month-to-month lease ? I only want to rent the apartment for five months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , all the leases are for one year . We don't have month-to-month leases .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then I don't think this would be a good apartment for me . Thank you anyway .
segments.speaker: S1
